settings.text: Witness visible improvements in your skin's texture, tone, and overall health, courtesy of our carefully curated blend of potent ingredients.

settings.title: Seersify is at the helm of leading-edge beauty science
settings.text: Seersify is a brand at the helm of leading-edge beauty science, made right here in Australia, using much of what this beautiful landscape has to offer. Be prepared to activate your senses of touch and sight for a sensorial and tactical journey to better skin as you age gracefully through life.

settings.title: Meet Patti Moolchaem - the founder of Seersify
settings.text: Seersify is truly a labour of love for founder, Patti Moolchaem. The supercharged skincare range was born out of a desire to demystify skincare, make it accessible and simple, and – above all else – efficacious. Patti has been working on Seersify behind the scenes for several years before launching in 2023.

settings.title: Patti has a deep understanding of how health and science work together
settings.text: A 15-year nursing background coupled with academic health research and cosmetic science is a cocktail of specialties that have made Patti a perfect candidate to start her very own skincare range. The full circle moment was a health scare of her own, which led to undergoing medical treatments with some adverse effects. This led her to holistic health care including yoga, meditation and the right nutrition, and ultimately, back to total health. Something new was in order.

settings.title: Patti wanted to do something that combined her passion for beauty and science, so she put her lens on the beauty industry.
settings.text: Studying cosmetic science with leading internally recognised education providers in Australia and the UK, coupled with intensive lab hours working with experienced cosmetic scientists led Patti to formulate her very first sample products. With an appreciation of the combined treatments Patti took to improve her health, she realised the power of science and nature and wanted to apply it to the Seersify skincare formulations. After personally trialling and testing products on her 40+ skin and witnessing the improvement she set out to create, Patti decided that she wanted to share Seersify with the world.

settings.title: Nature-infused skincare science
settings.text: The Seersify formulas are based on the skin as a living organ, providing it with nutrients to thrive, and the efficacy of formulas is a true merge of science and nature with transparency being Seersify’s guiding light.

settings.heading: Luxurious, fast absorbing, and with best-in-class results, all Seersify products are formulated by a team of cosmetic chemists and scientists

settings.text: Along with the help of technology, Seersify aims to simplify product formulations and create a skin routine that’s right for you, making the seemingly complex, simple. Seersify combines the beautiful qualities of organic and natural ingredients with scientifically proven formulas to create a perfect balance of high-performing hybrid products which offer your skin more than meets the eye.

settings.title: Seersify wants you to do more with less
settings.text: Add a balanced life that encompasses healthy living and a healthy approach to beauty, Seersify is a holistic beauty brand with scientific knowledge and innovative ingredients as the vantage point.

settings.title: Seersify believes that beauty is personal and diverse
settings.text: Everyone can and should be happy in their skin regardless of age and skin colour. Beauty is also about your sense of self, accepting and expressing the best of yourself. Seersify doesn’t view skin issues as a problem but as an imbalance stage from intrinsic and extrinsic factors, including hormonal, environmental, genetic and lifestyle. All Seersify products are formulated to support the skin to get back to a healthy balance.

settings.title: Seersify’s mission is clear and ambitious
settings.text: We aim to create smart, innovative formulas made with high-tech, active ingredients that show up on your skin with real results. No misinformation or loaded claims, just scientifically backed solutions for the skin.

settings.title: Seersify is guided by these pillars

settings.block_text: Balanced living means achieving optimal health and well-being in all aspects of life and striking harmony between them all. This includes embracing what naturally surrounds us together with a modern future including nature, science, and technology.

Our labs combine the beautiful qualities of organic and natural ingredients with scientifically proven formulas (synthetics) to create a perfect balance. Every formula is an innovative blend of science with the chemistry of nature, carefully crafted by a dedicated team.

Seersify products are formulated using ingredients that offer multiple benefits and wholly embraces a simple approach to skincare and well-being. . This could mean making the change from a 10-step morning or evening skincare ritual to a three-step and paying attention to what skin really needs in real time.

Everyone can be happy in their own skin regardless of age and skin color. Beauty is personal and diverse. It is not just only about physical attributes or the aesthetic appearance of the skin, but it is also about the deep sense you feel deep inside that allows you to be happy and expressing the best version of your true self.

We don't fight against ageing but age gracefully with the support of skincare products coupled with a healthy lifestyle. We don't see any skin issues as a problem, but an imbalance stage occurred from intrinsic and extrinsic factors. Therefore, Seersify products are formulated to support the skin to get back to a balanced state and fight off daily aggressors, resulting in healthy and beautiful skin.
